thread.title: BRIEF-Perion Announces Eyal Kaplan As Chairman Of Board Of Directors

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Perion Announces Eyal Kaplan As Chairman Of Board Of Directors
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Perion Network Ltd:
* PERION ANNOUNCES EYAL KAPLAN AS CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
* PERION NETWORK LTD - KAPLAN HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS NEW PERION CHAIRMAN OF BOARD, EFFECTIVE AS OF MAY 9, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
